example[0]: The dog suddenly went for me.
definition[1]: to try to get or win something
example[1]: Jackson is going for his second gold medal here.
example[2]: If you really want the job, go for it!
example[3]: I think Iâ€™ll go for the chocolate cake.
definition[3]: used to say that you would like to do or have something
example[4]: A full meal for less than five bucks! I could go for that!
definition[4]: to like a particular type of person or thing
example[5]: Annie tends to go for older men.
definition[5]: used to say that a statement you have just made is true about someone or something else too
example[6]: Close all doors and lock them when you go out. The same goes for windows.
